entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:42 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -38.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 1:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -38.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -42.3°C
Wind: WNW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 43.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 43. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 63 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
